text: Today was the dayI ve loved the number   since I first learned how to draw it  Today was going to be the day because of that  Seemed like the thing to do  Go out on   day like I should ve   years ago but I haven t  I m still here  still fighting   I m not sure why but I am sure and that s what s killing me  The duality of it all  The constant one thing or another but never the middle  I m trying to live in the middle these days  I m trying to be better  to get better while knowing that I never really will   My mental illness is not going away  There s treatment but no cure  That alone makes me wish for oblivion  But I ve only been diagnosed and  in treatment for a short while  Mere months  not years  That keeps me going  Always curious about the future  Always curious about what lasting contentment feels like while I wonder if I ll ever be able to have that at all  I guess not knowing keeps me here   Today was supposed to be the day  I m honestly glad it wasn t  It s a muggy early evening as I write this  The sun is setting casting its waxing light behind the rain clouds on the horizon  Insects call to each other from trees that sway in the cooling breeze  Cars pass by playing music I remember from my youth  Dogs pull leashes across pavement looking for a place to call heir own while followed by their owners  There is life happening all around me   And I m here  Alive  Smiling
summary: Today was supposed to be the day, but I'm glad it wasn't. It's a muggy early evening as I write this. Insects call to each other from trees that sway in the cooling breeze. Cars pass by playing music and dogs pull leashes across pavement.

text: Wrote It DownI have written down my plan to kill myself  It s not very explicit for the means I just have preferred methods based on the circumstances at the time  It also has some end of life activities to make sure that my mind is made up on the decision when the time comes   I say when and not if because I ve realized that it s a matter of time  Even when things are going my way and even when my philosophy surrounds being content with all of my feelings  my mind still defaults to hopelessness   I m the only person that deserves my own criticism because I m the one that sees everything I do  I don t matter and my mind is so flawed with depression and antisocial tendencies that I m going to die alone  I ve switched medications with almost no difference in my mindset  I ve done both talk therapy and cognitive behavioral therapy as well as trying bits of other methods   My life is garbage and I m stuck  I will try to be around for as long as I can in hopes that good habits make me happy again  I hope that when I die  my plan will help minimize or eliminate the pain in the aftermath
summary: I have written down a plan to kill myself. I have depression and antisocial tendencies. I switched medications with almost no difference in my mindset. I will try to be around for as long as I can in hopes that good habits will make me happy again.
cleaned: write plan kill depression antisocial tendency switch medication no difference mindset try long hope good habit happy

text: My grandma is posting my photos and personal info online and she didn t even ask beforehand  How do I get her stop  So  it s just now coming to my attention that my grandmother has a Facebook account on which she has been posting pictures of my brother and I for the past three years  I love her  but  girl  this got me heated  Three years and she never even bothered to tell us  much less ask And I know I m technically not an adult  but should I get a say in this  Like she has our full names  pictures from now to when I was a fetus  and more personal info  She even has a video of me playing my instrument and she knows how much I  hate  when people watch me play  I only let her record me because she said it was  just for safe keeping  and I assumed she only wanted to hear me play a song since we don t live very close  But no  that crap s on the page too Should I tell her that I don t appreciate this  If so  how
summary: My grandmother has been posting pictures of my brother and I on Facebook without asking. She also has a video of me playing an instrument. I hate when people watch me play. I don't know how to get her to stop.
